title: 3 man RANK QUEUES in 5v5 for OCE
body: So who thinks we should have 3 man RANK QUEUES in 5v5 for OCE? Vote below!

replies.body:
The only reason people tolerate duo queues is because it enables them to play with a friend, getting more people to play the game. Ranked 5's is where you go to play with friends and coordinate and stuff, whereas soloq is more your overall skill at the game as opposed to how well you work with people you know.

I see no advantage in enabled trio-q's in soloq
